Title: Sleepover: A Harrowing Ordeal of Emotional Brutality
Writer: Nick Kroll (created by), Andrew Goldberg (created by), Mark Levin (created by), Jennifer Flackett (created by), Victor Quinaz, Jess Dweck
Actors: Nick Kroll, John Mulaney, Fred Armisen, Jessica Chaffin
Plot: While the boys head to Jay's for a testosterone-fueled sleepover, Jessi throws a party of her own and gets caught up in mean-girl drama.
